description.value: The Advisors of Rubi-Ka was initially a project to found a society built on diplomacy. Whether a practicing member today, or not, the training received while participating in the ARK program is still sought after by many factions looking for a diplomat or negotiator.

ideals.description: "I brought out the best in somebody."
"I expressed my heritage, background, or beliefs through my actions."

life_path.name: Peacekeeper's Vow
life_path.description: Witnessing the devastating effects of conflict, you've dedicated your life to peacekeeping. Your journey is one of mediation, striving to prevent the horrors you once saw.

life_path.name: Diplomat Turned Adventurer
life_path.description: A diplomatic mission that ended in betrayal and loss led you to question your beliefs. Now, you seek a new path, using your diplomatic skills in a quest for truth and justice.

life_path.name: Fallen from Grace
life_path.description: Once a respected ARK member, a scandal — perhaps unjustly — tarnished your reputation. Determined to clear your name, you embark on a journey to uncover the truth.

life_path.name: Seeker of Harmony
life_path.description: Fascinated by the cultural mosaic of Rubi-Ka, you venture forth to understand the diverse peoples and bring harmony to a world rife with division and strife.

life_path.name: Whistleblower on the Run
life_path.description: After exposing deep corruption within ARK, you've been forced to flee. Pursued and isolated, you seek allies in your fight against the corruption you once served.
